result.name: pension-service-computer-system
result.notes: Pension Service Computer System.  Database containing details of customers claiming State Pension.  This is payable to customers who have reached State Pension Age and who have been paid or credited with National Insurance Contributions.  The information recorded includes Name, National Insurance Number, Address, claim details, payment history.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Pension Service Computer System

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/state-pension    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
